title: BRIEF-Bank Of The Philippine Islands Issues Over 3 Bln Pesos Long-Term Negotiable Certificates Of Time Deposit
text:
BRIEF-Bank Of The Philippine Islands Issues Over 3 Bln Pesos Long-Term Negotiable Certificates Of Time Deposit

Stock Markets 6 hours ago (Oct 25, 2019 18:16)

BRIEF-Bank Of The Philippine Islands Issues Over 3 Bln Pesos Long-Term Negotiable Certificates Of Time Deposit Oct 25 (Reuters) - Bank of the Philippine Islands :

* HAS ISSUED OVER 3 BILLION PESOS OF LONG-TERM NEGOTIABLE

CERTIFICATES OF TIME DEPOSIT

* ISSUANCE WAS PRICED ON OCTOBER 4, 2019 AT 4.00% P.A.

PAYABLE

QUARTERLY



Source text for Eikon: ID:nSN32gp1j

Further company coverage: BPI.PS





BRIEF-Bank Of The Philippine Islands Issues Over 3 Bln Pesos Long-Term Negotiable Certificates Of Time Deposit
